statements: DELETE FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE id = 1 AND compliance_status = false;
DELETE FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE disposal_date < '2022-01-01' AND waste_type = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE compliance_status = FALSE
DELETE FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' AND disposal_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE regulation_type = 'EPA' AND id = 1;
DELETE FROM waste_tracking WHERE tracking_status = 'in progress';
